name: Moontrain
description:
Moontrain is a dynamic point & click adventure game. The story follows a detective who needs to solve an impossible case. Everyone who tried to solve it had no luck, maybe you are just the detective we need.
Enter a surreal and mysterious world. Try to find clues and solve puzzles. Play challenging mini games that are not just for fun, this is serious detective work.

The Moontrain is departing from the station, all aboard!
